name: dr^k magazine ownership title
description: From 2011 to 2014, dr^k.mx pioneered independent internet journalism on the field of contemporary art, by documenting in Spanish the artistic practice of over 100 artists. It was founded and directed by Alonso Cedillo, along with Daniela Gil Esteva, Laos Salazar, and Karla Hern√°ndez. Because of this, the ownership title has been split into 4 editions, each one of them corresponding to the 4 members of the team. Own the four and you'll own the project.
